verses.text: \w For|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* rest, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w us|strong="G4012"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G4314"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w run|strong="G5143"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* importunate \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* God \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w strengthen|strong="G4741"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w keep|strong="G5442"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3982"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G3739"\w* \w command|strong="G3853"\w*, \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w direct|strong="G2720"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* charity \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w charge|strong="G3853"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* withdraw \w yourselves|strong="G4771"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w walking|strong="G4043"\w* disorderly, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w tradition|strong="G3862"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w received|strong="G3880"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w imitate|strong="G3401"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w were|strong="G3748"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* disorderly \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*;

\w Neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w did|strong="G3761"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w manâ€™s|strong="G5100"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3361"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* labour \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w toil|strong="G2873"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w worked|strong="G2038"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w should|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* chargeable \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G1519"\w* \w if|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w might|strong="G1473"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w pattern|strong="G5179"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w imitate|strong="G3401"\w* \w us|strong="G1325"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w we|strong="G3778"\w* declared \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*: \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w work|strong="G2038"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w we|strong="G0191"\w* \w have|strong="G5100"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w there|strong="G1722"\w* are \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w who|strong="G5100"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* disorderly, working \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3367"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* curiously meddling.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w charge|strong="G3853"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* beseech \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, working \w with|strong="G3326"\w* silence, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G5547"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w bread|strong="G0740"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w be|strong="G3361"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* weary \w in|strong="G0080"\w* well \w doing|strong="G2569"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w our|strong="G1223"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* epistle, \w note|strong="G4593"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w do|strong="G3361"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w keep|strong="G3361"\w* company \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G5100"\w* ashamed:

\w Yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G3361"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w esteem|strong="G2233"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w enemy|strong="G2190"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w admonish|strong="G3560"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* everlasting \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w place|strong="G1722"\w*. \w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w salutation|strong="G0783"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w own|strong="G1699"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*; \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w sign|strong="G4592"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* epistle. \w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w write|strong="G1125"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*. Amen.
